data.title: FM 2009: Official Ultimate Youngsters/Free Transfers Thread (Contains PA's/CA's)
data.meta_description: :mad:Warning:mad: The following players wont appear in all games as all countries must be selected for added players! This is the official youngsters and free transfers thread, i have only included the best of the best in both departments ranging from -9 to -10 on the youngsters and 130 to 200 on...
data.text:
:mad:Warning:mad: The following players wont appear in all games as all countries must be selected for added players!

This is the official youngsters and free transfers thread, i have only included the best of the best in both departments ranging from -9 to -10 on the youngsters and 130 to 200 on the free transfers! I have made things easy incase you have a certain position by categorizing every player with in either the Goalkeeper, Defender, Midfielder or Striker Sections. I have also done different sections starting at -10 players all the way down to -9(0 - 99 Age 18 Years). This meaning the best youngsters will be found at the top and the worst at the bottom!

Feel free to inform me on any youngsters you feel should be included into this thread that aren't already here!

Hope this helps your game!!!

If you had taken a look in the links thread, you would have seen under "misc"

http://community.sigames.com/showthread.php?t=60798

http://community.sigames.com/showthread.php?t=60896

The section starting from "140 - 200 (No Club)" and below could be useful to people however. Not sure weather it's best to merge it with one of the current PA/CA threads. While I have a think about that, I’ve got no problem with the thread fwiw.

Federico Fazio from Sevilla... now there's a defender built for scoring from corners. Was always the first player I would sign with any decent team. High defensive stats all-round, and he's 6'5" and thus the height to tower above the rest.

Always had him on FM08 and his stats are even better on FM08.
